channel.title: How do I connect to my server (Not other people just me)
channel.description:
How do I connect to my server locally. I set the server to 0.0.0.0:43594 and try to connect with a client using the same info and nothing, do you still have to port forward and all that nonsense? I have tried with multiple clients. I have a No-ip set up and even set that to 0.0.0.0. I just want to connect to the server just on my computer and check things out as I code. Any help would be much appreciated.
Note: I'm on a mac.
Edit: Took out "crappy Mopar client" due to the fact someone has an issue with personal opinions.

item.title: How do I connect to my server (Not other people just me)
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

How did you set your no-ip to 0.0.0.0?? but if your server is PI go into client.java client sided and set your IP to 127.0.0.1

Read full topic
